author: Christina Garnett
title: Digital marketers need to be constantly ‘plugged in’ — which is risky during the pandemic
description: Did you know TNW Conference has a track fully dedicated to exploring how technology will shape the ever-evolving marketing landscape this year? Check out the full ‘Rebrand‘ program here. I can’t speak for the entire digital community, but I can share my obser…
content:
